name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy and delicious pancakes topped with fresh berries and syrup.
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together buttermilk, eggs, melted butter, and vanilla.
Combine wet and dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Heat a pan and grease it lightly. Pour batter and cook pancakes until golden brown.
Serve with syrup and fresh berries.

name: Grilled Chicken
description: Juicy grilled chicken served with roasted vegetables.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Rub chicken breasts with olive oil, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side or until fully cooked.
Drizzle with lemon juice and serve with roasted vegetables.

name: Pasta
description: Creamy pasta with fresh basil and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and saut√© garlic until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Stir in parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
Toss the cooked pasta in the sauce and top with fresh basil.

name: Burger
description: Classic cheeseburger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
instructions: Season ground beef with salt, pepper, and Worcestershire sauce.
Form into patties and cook on a grill or pan for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add cheese slices on top and let melt.
Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, pickles, and serve on toasted buns.

name: Salad
description: Fresh garden salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, and olives.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
Top with crumbled feta cheese and serve.
